pr_title: Correct Device "Back" Button in Restore From Backup

timeline.message: Add a system back key listener for restore backup

timeline.body:
Without a bit more specifics on where the log came from, it will be hard to trace, suggest 👇

                        Timber.i("DIALOG_RESTORE_BACKUP caught hardware back button");

Doesn't seem to specify that you need to show the returned dialog, many examples don't, and show() is called during onStart
